song.title: Ein Communist Svin
song.info:
Discarded from music compo at Abduction 1995
...but received some kind of comfort prize (ten disks) for "the best attitude"
lyrics translated:
go to hell you **cking communist pig, what do you complain to me, like I was interested?
cannot hear the answer...
you come to me crying: give me food, give me money even though everybody can see that you have a helluva beer gut so, go to hell
---- note: literally "painu vittuun" means "go to cunt"
